page.title: 06Leafield People.
page.content: The people in our village are friendly and caring about their surroundings. New people in our village are different because they are not so friendly. The most common family size here is 4. The commonest women's ages are 33years and 10years and the commonest man's age is 11.The most common boy's name is Peter. The most common girl's name is Sarah. We think that the old people are much more friendly than the young people. Our Vicar is called Mr Smith. Mr Smith is a very kind man and if you go down to his house he always gives you two toffees. Mrs Godfrey is our caretaker for the school. She comes up and goes down on a little motor scooter. We call her Super Gran.
